Summary: red orang glowing spheres. random formation ascending and decending
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were lighting fireworks when all the sudden I look to my south and notice red ball of light floating in the sky then vanished. I didn't think nothing of it. Then 5 minutes later I zee 4-5 more red balls of light due NW rising up to the sky most of them disappeared and few of them took a flight path. Then vanished. After this I continue to see man more up to 12am coming from the west and more from the east. Minimum of 20 total seen it was so amazing same time freaky!
